evidence.text: arrested without a warrant after December 5, 2014, and detained by the City of Houston for unreasonable periods of detention, without the requisite judicial probable cause determination.

whenever it takes longer than 48 hours to transfer such arrestees to the Harris County Jail, the City, as a matter of practice and custom, continues to detain the arrestees in its jail cells, without a neutral probable cause finding

add_extracted.value: Plaintiffs were arrested without a warrant after December 5, 2014, and detained by the City of Houston for unreasonable periods without probable cause determinations, including delays exceeding 48 hours for Class A and 24-48 hours for Class B, with transfers to Harris County Jail occurring after detention periods.

evidence.text: the plaintiffs’ motion for class certification should be GRANTED
the plaintiffs’ motion for class certification is GRANTED

add_extracted.value: Granted class certification for Class A (over 48 hours) and Class B (24-48 hours) under Rule 23(b)(3)

evidence.text: Fifth Circuit Court ORDER - PER CURIAM Advising We GRANT the City's petition and VACATE the district court's 4/24/2019 and 5/24/2019 orders as they pertain to the documents contained in TAb 3 of Exhibit A. The City's Petition is DENIED in all other respects. We further REMAND this matter to the district court for further proceedings consistent with this opinion. (USCA No. 19-20377)

add_extracted.value: Appeal: City of Houston appealed to Fifth Circuit Court

evidence.text: Case 4:16-cv-03577 Document 198 Filed on 03/18/21 in TXSD

add_extracted.value: 2021-03-18: Entry of Final Approval Order and Judgment

evidence.text: This Final Approval Order and Judgment shall remain in effect for a period of five (5) years from the date of entry, unless modified by the Court.

add_extracted.value: Five years: Decree remains in effect for five years from entry

evidence.text: The Defendant shall implement new inmate classification procedures within 180 days of the entry of this Order, including revised protocols for medical evaluations and housing assignments.

add_extracted.value: Defendant shall implement new inmate classification procedures within 180 days

evidence.text: The Defendant shall submit biannual compliance reports to the Court detailing implementation progress, including any modifications to procedures or staffing.

add_extracted.value: Defendant shall provide biannual compliance reports to the Court
